abstract: Emanuel Goffer executed trades based on proprietary information his brother Zvi, a former Galleon Group trader, bribed out of others. Zvi Goffer has been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
snippet: Emanuel Goffer executed trades based on proprietary information his brother Zvi, a former Galleon Group trader, bribed out of others. Zvi Goffer has been sentenced to 10 years in prison.

headline.main: Trader Sentenced to 3 Years in Insider Case
headline.print_headline: Three Years for Trader in Insider Scheme
